Message.Title: Fox news right to lie and distort & weasel
Message.Msg: rightwing Fox news argued their modus operandi in court: the right to lie, distort and weasel in the typical gop manner. " a Florida Court of Appeals unanimously agreed with an assertion by FOX News that there is no rule against distorting or falsifying the news in the United States. Lawyers paid by Bill O'Reilly's bosses argued in court that Fox can lie with impunity. It's their right under the 1st Ammendment FOX asserted that there are no written rules against distorting news in the media. They argued that, under the First Amendment, broadcasters have the right to lie or deliberately distort news reports on public airwaves. During their appeal, FOX asserted that there are no written rules against distorting news in the media. They argued that, under the First Amendment, broadcasters have the right to lie or deliberately distort news reports on public airwaves. Fox attorneys did not dispute Akre’s claim that they pressured her to broadcast a false story, they simply maintained that it was their right to do so."

Message.Title: Mitten's new healthcare plan
Message.Msg: "I’m pretty sure that Mitt Romney could rename the exchanges as “Ronald Reagan Insurance Marketplaces,” the subsidies as “Free Enterprise Vouchers,” and the individual mandate as, I don’t know, the “Stop the Free Riders Program” or something, and not one in a hundred conservatives would complain about the new plan. As I’ve said, they don’t mind the Affordable Care Act at all; it’s Obamacare that they hate. Which, perhaps, explains why Mitt Romney could get himself nominated in the first place despite never disowning his Massachusetts health care reforms."

Message.Title: and for our Suday dinner
Message.Msg: crab cakes. 1 1/2 lbs lump crab meat mixed with decadent may, eggs, dijon mustard, worcester, chives, and paresly and bread crums. Made 8 huge cakes. Served with corn on cob, my own award winning cole slaw and my homegrown beets. Eat your hearts out!

Topic.Title: decadent may

Message.Msg: mayo. Forgot. Also sauteed in butter.

Topic.Title: Howmuch ya pay up there for 1lb of lump or just good crab?

Message.Msg: crab is expensive. This morning I paid $16 for 8 oz jumbo lump crab meat and $24 for pound of regular lump crab meat. I do this once per year in the summer. Just too expensive.

Topic.Title: Howmuch ya pay up there for 1lb of lump or just good crab?

Message.Msg: Havre De Grace, gorgeous little town at the top of the Chesapeake Bay. On your way to NJ. Picturesque.

Topic.Title: Howmuch ya pay up there for 1lb of lump or just good crab?

Message.Msg: cole slaw award winning. I awarded it to myself. Fresh head of cabbage. Diced cucumber. Carrot, celery and onion of course. Diced red pepper just for color and taste of course. Dressing made of red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, salt and sugar. 1/2 cup mayo and 1/2 cup sour cream. Gotta add fresh paresly and mix in caraway seeds and celery seeds. Very fresh and very tasty side. Looks nice too.

Topic.Title: Unlike Phil, I have a big sense of humor

Message.Msg: No, comrade, You are Dictated to every day! Go try and smoke some POT?? Hey, I know people that attest to its Religious power to give dreams and visions. Medically, Pot is Harmless. Try your Freedom there, comrade. Food, try and eat: “an endangered species,” or try, Try anything, because you are dictated to in every way, shape and form. Some Cheese from France could land you in Jail. Try fishing and watch how fast “You are dictated to” because you caught one too many, or too small, or some other dictatable Item; because “as we know,” America Created the Heavens and the Earth, and therefore, all belongs to America! Try and smoke a Cigarette?? Try and Order Cigarettes over the internet? You have no freedom, comrade, it is all part of your delusional thinking, as a lamb, you have no power; therefore, you pretend "all is well" and nothing is wrong in this world. Freedom … MY AXX!! See, comrade, at Dachau the camp guards funneled the sheep at the main gates, whipping them and dogs barking, but nobody had the sense to fight back, nobody. All sheep, and a Sheep asked Once: “where is this Freedom,” after reading the “WORK BRINGS FREEDOM” SLOGAN ON THE MAIN GATE. THE GUARD “LAUGHED,” POINTING TO THE SMOKE STACKS … Somke emminating from the stacks... “THERE IS YOUR FREEDOM!” THE SHEEP THOUGHT IT WAS A "WORK CAMP" and would bring freedom, THEREFORE, the sheep WENT SHEEPISHLY INTO AGREEMENT WITH HIS EXECUTIONERS. SAD, BUT TRUE. A GREAT MAN HAS RESPONSIBILITIES TO MODIFY THE BEHAVIOR OF OTHERS, COMRADE. A Lion would Fight!
